last_episode_to_air.name: A Belated Birthday Party
last_episode_to_air.overview: One day, after the voices mocking Sayaka had finally settled down, Alya calls Masachika. In the conversation, Alya promises that if Masachika ranks within the top 30 in the upcoming exam, she will do whatever he asks. However, in the midst of the conversation, Alya realizes that she wasn’t invited to Masachika’s birthday party, which makes her feel down. This is because in Russia, inviting someone to a birthday party is a sign of friendship! Understanding the reason for Alya's disappointment, Masachika decides to invite her out.

name: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

next_episode_to_air.name: An Unexpected Prelim
next_episode_to_air.overview: Masachika catches a cold and contacts Yuki to let her know he'll be absent from school. However, it is Alya who comes to take care of him after school. Alya makes porridge, and even has to deal with Ayano, who shows up dressed as a maid... After a chaotic day, Masachika finally wakes up around noon the next day. Meanwhile, Alya is invited as a guest on Yuki’s midday school broadcast. With Masachika on sick leave, can Alya manage to handle this unexpected event as a candidate for student council president?

original_name: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん
overview: Alya is a transfer student enjoying popularity at her new high school, often sporting a cold shoulder while earning high marks in class. She ignores her nerdy classmate, Kuze Masachika, except for when she blurts out a flirtatious line to him in Russian. Little does she know, Kuze understands Russian, though he pretends not to. Let’s see where this wacky love story takes them!

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
Alya-san, who sits next to Masachika Kuze, always gives him the cold shoulder.

However, she sometimes blurts out a few flirtatious words to him in Russian.

Masachika never misses a word of it. That’s because Masachika has native-level Russian listening skills!

Alya-san, who thinks he doesn’t understand and sometimes blurts out words of affection.

Masachika, who understands the meaning but pretends not to.

Where will their love story which keeps you grinning take them!?
